verses.name: Hosea 13:8
verses.text: I will meet them as a bear that is bereaved of her whelps, and will rend the caul of their heart, and there will I devour them like a lion: the wild beast shall tear them.

verses.name: Hosea 13:9
verses.text: O Israel, thou hast destroyed thyself; but in me is thine help.

verses.name: Hosea 13:10
verses.text: I will be thy king: where is any other that may save thee in all thy cities? and thy judges of whom thou saidst, Give me a king and princes?

verses.name: Hosea 13:11
verses.text: I gave thee a king in mine anger, and took him away in my wrath.
